english.segment1: Theres a light in the darkness that shines. Giving hope to all the world. Hope to all the world. Theres a door thats been opened to all. Into a new and living way. A new and living way
english.segment2: Praise the name of Jesus. Perfect Redeemer. Star of the morning. Yesterday, today and forever. Jesus the same. Jesus the same
english.segment3: Theres a fire that burns in our hearts. To see the lost return to the Father. Its a passion thats not of our own. We have seen it in the Son. In the face of the Son
english.segment4: Wonderful Counselor. Mighty God. Eternal Father. Prince of Peace
